page.title: 07Housing
page.content: {TWO GIRLS, AGED 9 & 10, WRITE: This area is mainly council houses. Types of homes are flats, maisonettes and terraced & semi detatched houses. {Many people have moved out of their {houses because they are now being {demolished. When they build new houses {they move back to the area. { }There are quite a few building sites and some houses near us which have recently been built. The people prefer houses to high rise flats because they can have a garden and they don't have stairs to climb if lifts break down. {There is a home for old people and {it is called Thomas Winder Court. If {old people are in trouble an alarm {sounds and a red light flashes 'HELP' { }People mostly cook on gas, because it's cheaper than electricity and heat their homes with gas too. Some use electricity and only a few use coal.
